I know I am gonna remind those I love, like my nieces, you have to watch everywhere you go! That is sad, but we live in that world. Don't go into spaces by yourself, as a white woman, that you stand out like easy prey. Carry when you can! 

I see so many young people, well even older people, so disengaged. Unalert into phone, and have sound cancelling headphones.  1000% not blaming this young lady, or saying if she wasn't on phone she would have been alive. But she certainly assumed she was in safe climate. Gotta be careful. Some trips are not worth risk. Sad we are in that world.
